fields.description:
ASIHTTPRequest is no longer under active development:

http://allseeing-i.com/%5Brequest_release%5D;
http://groups.google.com/group/asihttprequest/browse_thread/thread/7731197dbe71c260

Normally, for 3rd party components, we can continue to support them long after development has stopped. ASI is a special case since it's extremely complex code, and is integral to a lot of mobile app support. We need to investigate alternatives, and then replace it.
fields.summary: ASIHTTP no longer under active development; need to investigate replacement

comments.body: Given that we are replacing ASIHttp with NSURLConnection in TIMOB-15980, this will be addressed by that ticket.
Closing ticket as duplicate with reference to the above comments.
